Text:
Hey Karaoke, Can you get,

Aushwitz By Miklos Nyiszli

And

Lost in Shangri-La: A True Story of Survival, Adventure, and the Most Incredible Rescue Mission of World War II By Mitchell Zuckoff

And what about

The Last Train to Dachau by Robert B. Niklewicz

That's all thanks!!

Something wrong with the timing on this rip. Mp3 track sounds normal but 1 sec of play takes an actual realworld 8secs so the graphics are continuously slipping out of sync. MRH82 plays fine along with all other mp3+cdg. Can someone else test to confirm?

The bitrate is only 56kbps!!

Not up to karaokeking123 usual standard
Karaokeking123 - PLEASE can you you re-rip this release and hopefully solve the bitrate and timing issues. Many thanks.
